flavorText: She lures victims with promises of flesh, captures them in a net of deceit, and destroys them in the embrace of the sea.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie lockt ihre Opfer mit fleischlichen Versprechungen an, verstrickt sie in einem Netz aus Verrat und ertränkt sie im Meer.
foreignData.name: Betörende Sirene
foreignData.text: {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, greift dich in diesem Zug an, falls möglich.

foreignData.flavorText: Atrae a las víctimas con promesas carnales, los captura con una red de engaños y los destruye con el abrazo del mar.
foreignData.name: Sirena tentadora
foreignData.text: {T}: La criatura objetivo que controla un oponente te ataca este turno si puede.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle attire ses victimes par des promesses charnelles, les capture dans un filet de déception et les détruit par l'étreinte de la mer.
foreignData.name: Sirène attirante
foreignData.text: {T} : La créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle vous attaque ce tour-ci si possible.

foreignData.flavorText: Adesca le vittime con promesse di carne, le cattura in una rete di inganni e le distrugge nell'abbraccio del mare.
foreignData.name: Sirena Seducente
foreignData.text: {T}: Una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario ti attacca in questo turno, se può farlo.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女は獲物を素肌の約束で誘惑し、嘘の網で捕らえ、海の抱擁で亡き者とする。
foreignData.name: 魅惑するセイレーン
foreignData.text: {T}：いずれかの対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それは可能ならあなたを攻撃する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — セイレーン

foreignData.flavorText: 그녀는 육체를 미끼로 사냥감을 유혹해, 거짓의 그물로 사로잡은 뒤 바다의 포옹으로 파멸시킨다.
foreignData.name: 매혹적인 사이렌
foreignData.text: : 상대가 조종하는 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 이 턴에 가능하면 당신을 공격해야 한다.

foreignData.flavorText: Ela seduz as vítimas com tentações mundanas, capturando-as numa rede de mentiras para depois destruí-las com o abraço do mar.
foreignData.name: Sirena Sedutora
foreignData.text: {T}: A criatura alvo controlada por um oponente o ataca neste turno se estiver apta.

foreignData.flavorText: Она заманивает своих жертв обещаниями плотских утех, захватывает их в сети обмана и уничтожает их в объятиях моря.
foreignData.name: Пленительная Сирена
foreignData.text: {T}: целевое существо под контролем оппонента атакует вас в этом ходу, если может.

foreignData.flavorText: 她拿身体诱惑对象，以欺瞒罗网捕获，并以大海之拥消灭他们。
foreignData.name: 诱人塞连
foreignData.text: {T}：目标由对手操控的生物本回合若能攻击你，则必须攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 她拿身體誘惑對象，以欺瞞羅網捕獲，並以大海之擁消滅他們。
foreignData.name: 誘人塞連
foreignData.text: {T}：目標由對手操控的生物本回合若能攻擊你，則必須攻擊。

name: Alluring Siren
originalText: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.

rulings.text: After the ability resolves, the targeted creature attacks you only if it’s able to do so as that turn’s declare attackers step begins. If, at that time, the creature is tapped, is affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t attack, or is affected by “summoning sickness,” it can’t attack. If there’s a cost associated with having that creature attack, its controller isn’t forced to pay that cost, so the creature doesn’t have to attack in that case either.
If the targeted creature would be able to attack either you or a planeswalker you control, it must attack you, not the planeswalker.
Activating the ability during your opponent’s turn after attackers have been declared will have no effect. The same is true if you activate the ability during your own turn.

text: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.
